page.title: 14LIFE STYLES
page.content: {0130-0500}Baby wakes, is fed. Checks children,back to bed.Baby wakes,plays. Mother dozes.{0500-0700}Father wakes, takes baby down, leaves mother in bed. Father goes to work, baby fed. Drink tea,talking to baby. Pegs washing out, watches TV news, changes, feeds baby. {0700-0900}Wakes children, makes breakfast. Puts washing in machine, makes baby's bottles, baby plays. Tidy house,children leave for school, cares for baby. Goes shopping, baby sleeps, makes lunch.{1300-1500}Clear dinner things, tidy up. Leisure -crossword or gardening. Baby wakes,fed and changed, makes tea.{1500-1800}Mother prepares for work as cleaner at Haydock High. Prepares baby, father comes home looks after children.Puts baby to bed.Clears up. Leisure -TV, garden.{2100-2215} Children to bed.{2200-2300}Makes Dad's snap,cleans baby's bottles,goes to bed
